- ------------------------------------------------------------------------

*From:* AnnAngel Admin. [mailto:admin@ann-angel.com]
*Sent:* Saturday, March 26, 2005 5:19 AM
*To:* 'abuse@theplanet.com'
*Subject:* YOU ARE HOSTING COPYRIGHTED CONTENT ILLEGALLY



Hello,



My name is Catalin Radu. I am the webmaster of http://ann-angel.com
<http://ann-angel.com/>.   I am writing to you because one of your
clients is using your servers to illegally post galleries from our member?s
section of Ann-Angel.com.  The offending pages is here:



http://www.tuweberotica.com/privado/ann-angel.htm



Please remove this from your servers immediately!  They do not have our
permission to do this and it is a violation of copyright laws.



Also, if you can please verify the email contact you guys have for this
person for me so I can contact him directly.  Is it?.info@presencianet.com
or this?.hostmaster@nomitek.com?



Thank you for your assistance in solving this matter!



Sincerely,

Catalin Radu





http://digitalangelimages.com



-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCSPUxvK/XpJs6oyURApJKAJ0W+p7EEek1iEqitBFbx72Tj0eD5wCfe1MV
WYZ/H51nHF9VKAAZlNLoH54=
=tpow
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
